    • Constructor Detail

      • ParkNodeCommunicator

        public ParkNodeCommunicator(ParkNode parentParkNode)
        Each ParkNodeCommunicator has a ParkNodeReceiver for handling incoming messages. The ParkNodeCommunicator forwards messages from the ParkNode to other ParkNode(s) and forwards messages coming from other ParkNode(s) through its ParkNodeReceiver, to the ParknNode's logic for handling.
        Parameters:
        parentParkNode - The ParkNode for which we set up the ParkNodeCommunicator.

    • Method Detail

      • startCheckingStatusOfNode

        public void startCheckingStatusOfNode(NodeToCommunicateWith newNeighbour)
        Initiate the thread that checks if node is alive.
        Parameters:
        newNeighbour - node to check if alive.

      • nodeLeft

        public void nodeLeft(java.lang.String nodeId)
        Node has left.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - id of the node that left.

      • runListener

        public void runListener()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Run listener that starts the incoming messages mechanism of the node.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • runMessenger

        public void runMessenger(java.lang.String id,
                         java.lang.String ip,
                         int port,
                         java.lang.String message)
                  throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Sends messages to server (happens instantly).
        Parameters:
        ip - The receiving's node id.
        port - The receiving's node port.
        message - The receiving's node message, including the information of the id, ip, and port of the node which is sending the message.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException
        java.io.IOException

      • processIncomingMessage

        public void processIncomingMessage(java.lang.String incomingMessage)
                            throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Process incoming message from ParkNodeReceiver.
        Parameters:
        incomingMessage - The message to process.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Message coming from someone that is not registered as a neighbour.
        java.io.IOException - IOException.

                                java.io.IOException
        Forward message from a node to another node.
        Parameters:

        message - The message.
        Throws:
